hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSH_Key_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Key name at AWS to be used for accessing Edge

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Users_SSH_Key_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Users key name to be passed into EDGE

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SSN_SG_ids
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID of the SSN Security Group to be accessible

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rand=`openssl rand -hex 10`; echo '{}' | sudo docker run -i -v /project_images/${SSH_Key_Name}.pem:/root/keys/${SSH_Key_Name}.pem -v /home/ubuntu:/response -e "request_id=$rand" -e "user_keyname=$Users_SSH_Key_Name" -e "conf_service_base_name=${Service_base_name}" -e "edge_user_name=${Username}" -e "creds_security_groups_ids=${SSN_SG_ids}" -e "creds_key_name=$SSH_Key_Name" docker.epmc-bdcc.projects.epam.com/dlab-aws-edge --action $Action ;
